overview: Creep Records is a vinyl record store with a focus on exclusive releases, local artists, and alternative genres.
history: No specific founding date mentioned, but they seem to have been around for some time based on their available inventory.

hours_location.store_hours: Sun - Thurs: 11:00 AM - 8:00 PMFri - Sat: 11:00 AM - 9:00 PM
